entry: Initial setup — Llama 3.1 8B, Telegram bot @mule32bot configured, dmPolicy allowlisted for Jeremy, session path bug fixed
Initial setup — Qwen2.5-Coder 7B, Telegram bot configured, coding specialist role, session path bug fixed, first Telegram response to Jeremy
Day 1: Built kermiclemedia.com, set up multi-agent Telegram, created AP Technologies proposal, configured morning report cron, learned encoding/path/PowerShell lessons
Morning report #1 — first full day review. No overnight training sessions yet. Planning: test Mule/Forge with real tasks, develop specialized skills for each.

Completed ALL 8 tasks: Image Optimizer, FastAPI Template, Telegram Bot Template, Lead Scraper, Invoice Generator, MD-to-HTML Converter, File Organizer, URL Shortener, CSV-to-Dashboard (9 total). Now in practice mode. Learned Pillow, Chart.js, regex MD parsing, and more.
Delivered cold outreach DM templates (5 niches) and full Services & Pricing page with tiered pricing for Kermicle Media.
Fixed Telegram multi-account 409 conflicts, built office dashboard on GitHub Pages (desktop + mobile), created gateway watchdog, updated MEMORY.md with lessons.
Morning report #2 — Day 2 recap. Forge crushed 9 projects, Mule delivered business content, infrastructure stabilized.
